title: Got suspended  for 2 weeks after 3 years of playing and finally deciding to quit
body:
Ok, ok i know that these types of threads usually get down voted into oblivion, but I don't really care anymore.

So as the title says, yea i did get suspended for being toxic and what not, and you are probably going to say "oh who gives a fuck about a scumbag like you, and why are you posting this shit? We don't care". Well I am posting about this because of one simple reason: I can't share this with anyone else.

Just like Dunkey got banned almost 2 years ago. He was banned because he was "toxic" and it's true what he said "I can understand being banned for cheating or going afk a bunch of times" but why would you get banned for being "toxic" if someone is feeding/trolling on purpose and you can't explain that bastard that you are in your promotions . But Riot is basically putting people like that and people like me in the same box...

Like I am far from being a good player, I ain't in high elo but I don't really care for elo as much as i care for having fun playing my favorite game of all times. After 3 years of playing, 4 accounts - 2 EUW(one perma banned for "account sharing") 1 OCE and finally one here on the EUNE servers

I didn't want to get a job for the past 3 years because I simply loved spending time playing this game and having fun with friends, even back in season 3 before the fancy map and the new champs (and all the game updates). I spent over $1000 on this game, supported it no matter what, played for almost 10-15 hours every day, and now I am compared to bastards that only play it for like 1-2 hours a day/week...

Some of you have families and jobs and I respect that, no offence to you if you don't get to play the game as much as i do, but having a 3/19 Brand in your game inting on purpose... I am sorry but that's just the breaking point for me... And i report them after the game but i am the one getting banned because "I was toxic towards a feeder/troll"... Why?

You already took my main acc and now this?!  Thank you a lot Riot! For all the time, effort and money i put into this game! Thanks a lot.


P.S I do hope that one day you make a perfect game out of LoL I really do , but banning one "toxic" player out of millions and millions of trollers and feeder will not make a difference
